data.eml:eml: A revision of Nearctic species of the genus Geostiba Thomson, 1858 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gusarov, Vladimir I. (2002): A revision of Nearctic species of the genus Geostiba Thomson, 1858 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 81: 1-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155701
